General.Name: Permskaya Energosbytovaya OAO
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company engages in the electricity supply to the population and organizations of the Perm Krai. It also sells electricity metering devices, water and gas meters, cable and wiring products, lamps, shield equipment, equipment for receiving digital television, tickets, and products for home and office online. Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company was formerly known as Perm Power Sale Company Open Joint-Stock Company and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company in July 2015. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Perm, Russia with branches in Kungur, Zakamsky, Gubakha, Kudymkar, and Ocher, Russia.

2.Name: Ekaterina Vladimirovna Lyubimova
